name: Completing the issuance process and viewing the success message
scenarioId: android/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel-Issue_Identity_attestations_65/photoIDCrossDevice:Completing the issuance process and viewing the success message
methodName: Completing the issuance process and viewing the success message

testSteps.description: Given the user is on the issuer's service page and has authenticated
When the user consents to the issuance and provides their personal details into the form
Then the user should be redirected back to the EUDI Wallet app
And a success message should appear

userStory.narrative:
As a user of the EUDI Wallet
  I want to request and store photo ID attestations in my EUDI Wallet
  So that I can identify myself using my EUDI Wallet in my travel user journey by presenting the requested attestations

title: Completing the issuance process and viewing the success message
